341.title: Airport Security
341.description: A relevant document would discuss how effective government orders to better scrutinize passengers and luggage on international flights and to step up screening of all carry-on baggage has been.

367.title: Piracy
367.description: What modern instances have there been of old fashioned piracy, the boarding or taking control of boats?

650.title: Tax Evasion Indicted
650.description: Identify individuals or corporations that have been indicted on charges of tax evasion of more than two million dollars in the U.S. or U.K.
